segments.text: May I ask whether we are allowed to wear casual clothes in the office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , company rules are not very strict at this point .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for telling me that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But remind you , there are some forbidden activities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are they ? I ’ ll be careful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t use office phones for personal matters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Never ever come to work drunk , also smoking in the office is not allowed .
segments.speaker: S2
